Package emissary.command

Provides classes necessary to interact with Emissary on the command line.

EmissaryCommands are used by Emissary to handle different functions of the system, which include starting, stopping, pausing, and querying the system. EmissaryCommands wrap Picocli classes for parsing the command line, converting/validating/assigning the fields with the correct values, and usage printing.
